Tech.name: The Hidden Blade
Tech.Description: The Assassins are the elite killers of the Shosuro shinobi orders, trained to kill their targets with a single precise stab or slice. When attacking a surprised or unaware opponent with a knife, you may activate this Technique by spending a Void Point (as a Free Action). Your attack will target a vital spot, and any Raises for damage you make on that target are kept dice (+1k1 per Raise) insted of unkept (+1k0).

RequirementOption.text: Must be Rank 5 in Shosuro Infiltrator or Shosuro Actor school
